title: 97/756/EC: Commission Decision of 4 November 1997 nominating the members of the Committee of Senior Labour Inspectors (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 4 November 1997 nominating the members of the Committee of Senior Labour Inspectors (Text with EEA relevance) (97/756/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The persons named in the Annex to the present Decision are appointed as members of the Committee of Senior Labour Inspectors for a period of three years as from 1 January 1998.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 November 1997.
For the Commission
Pádraig FLYNN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 188, 9. 8. 1995, p. 11.
ANNEX
